description: Converts a datatable to a CSV string.

input.name: separator
input.description:
The character used as column delimiter.
If unspecified, defaults to `,`.

input.name: newline
input.description:
The character used as row delimiter.
If unspecified, defaults to `\n` (newline).

input.name: columns
input.description:
The list of columns to be included in the CSV text.
If unspecified, defaults to `null` (all columns).
